content.question: In the final sentence of the passage, the narrator suggests that the person who has had the "accident" will

choices.label: be reluctant to respond to verbal attacks from Touchwood
have only kindly feelings toward Touchwood
have a lower opinion of Touchwood than before the accident

content.answer: be reluctant to respond to verbal attacks from Touchwood

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
